This list shows the things that needs to be done:
More documentation: many methods have not yet been described (See Javadoc Stats). Better documentation: each class can have example code on how to use that class.
Write a non-accelerated 3D viewer, like the one in Jmol. Some work has been done, but it is not completed.
More JUnit tests: not all methods of the core classes are tested.

This lists shows the things we would like to have/do:
IUPAC name parser/producer
Substructure search
A energy minimizer / moleculare dynamics module
An interface API to other programs and implementation (like Tinker, Gaussian, Mopac etc)
LibIO to CMLDOM.
A cdk-merge program that adds information of a second file to the information from the first one.
Improved CML reader that is able to read XHTML documents with CML fragments.
A SVGWriter class that generates SVG images.
Command line tools (cdk-dbquery/cdk-dbinsert) to add structures to and retrieve structures from the database.
A IChIReader that parses IChI identifiers (v. 0.9). (See this press release).
Other wishes can be found and posted at this SF webpage.
